action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Children's Literacy Initiative on Military Bases Act of 2022 or the CLIMB Act of 2022
This bill authorizes the Department of Defense to implement a program to promote early literacy among children whose caregivers are members of the Armed Forces as part of the pediatric primary care of such children.
